body:
It looks like this commit solves the high latency measured in https://github.com/spion/hashtable-latencies.

Today, I reran the benchmark with Go current master branch (78c46581f4da82473f3efcbbe1f3b48625f88471) and now Go's latency is similar and even inferior to OCaml:

![histogram](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/594688/18556238/1719a682-7b6b-11e6-849d-c854307a092d.png)

Thanks @aclements!
